snippet.textDisplay: Fantastic game, and one of my first video series, actually! I held the #3 Ice/Portal speedrun and the #4 All-items record for quite a while! (: Really excited for Ittle Dew 2!
snippet.textOriginal: Fantastic game, and one of my first video series, actually! I held the #3 Ice/Portal speedrun and the #4 All-items record for quite a while! (: Really excited for Ittle Dew 2!

snippet.textDisplay: Finished this game 2 days ago in one sitting and was very pleasantly surprised. As you can see, it's a Zelda-clone (with constant obvious references), but its art style and humor help make it stand out from the rest. The game was pretty easy, but some puzzles were mighty impressive: the optional Master Cave in particular had a couple puzzles that completely stumped me for 30+ mins each, with me having a big smile everytime I ended up finding the solution. You only get a few items to solve puzzles, but they each have some surprisingly deep mechanics. Recommended!
snippet.textOriginal: Finished this game 2 days ago in one sitting and was very pleasantly surprised. As you can see, it's a Zelda-clone (with constant obvious references), but its art style and humor help make it stand out from the rest. The game was pretty easy, but some puzzles were mighty impressive: the optional Master Cave in particular had a couple puzzles that completely stumped me for 30+ mins each, with me having a big smile everytime I ended up finding the solution. You only get a few items to solve puzzles, but they each have some surprisingly deep mechanics. Recommended!
